modName: A Song of Ice and Fire Gear
summary: My First Mod: A set of standalone retextured items based off \'Game of Thrones\' or A Song of Ice and fire. Only has a set of Lannister armour and a Targaryen shield as of the moment. Males only.
descriptionHtml:
A set of standalone retextures based on the various houses of \'Game of Thrones\'. This is my very first ever visual mod, so I don\'t think you can expect too much. 
Right now, this includes:
-Lannister Cuirass
-Lannister Sabatons
-Lannister Gauntlets
-Targaryen Shield.

All of these have enchantments based on the personalities of their respective houses, Lannister armour will give you a speechcraft bonus, while Targaryen armour protects you from fire, and so on.

These items will be found atop a chest in Whiterun\'s Underforge.

**PLEASE NOTE THAT EVERYTHING EXCEPT THE SHIELD HAVE NO FEMALE VERSIONS. I haven\'t gotten around to doing the female versions just yet.**

By the way, I MIGHT have used LetoKolente\'s Ebony Armour retextures as a base. I\'m not really sure, but if you do notice some gold trimmings in your ebony armour, especially females, then thank LetoKolente. 

I will be updating this mod in the future and adding more armour sets. But due to time constraints and school, I don\'t think I will have much time for this. Sorry.
author: Ser Lemmington
